mean_cn: adj. 巨人的，力大无比的；  n. 泰坦尼克号
mean_en: a luxury British liner that struck an iceberg near Newfoundland on its maiden voyage on the night of April 14–15, 1912, with the loss of 1513 lives
sentence: I heard they made a movie about the Titanic. Have you seen it?
sentence_trans: 听说他们拍了一部有关泰坦尼克号的电影，你看了吗？
